statements: DELETE FROM performance_monitoring WHERE measurement_name = 'CPU' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_monitoring_data WHERE metric_name = 'CPU utilization';
DELETE FROM performance_monitoring_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND message LIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM infrastructure_as_a_service WHERE provider_name = 'Azure' AND cost >= 1000.00;
DELETE FROM server_information WHERE hardware = 'Dell PowerEdge R640';
DELETE FROM server_information WHERE server_name = 'Server-A' AND location = 'USA';
